definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to deal in/to buy and sell/to trade in/to retail/to peddle

sentences.english: Budweiser is now a wholesale channel in Tianjin have occupied 90% of the share.
sentences.chinese: 現在百威在天津量販式渠道已經佔據了90%的份額。
